text: Jeannette Wirz CBE (n√©e Altwegg; 8 September 1930 - 18 June 2021) was a British figure skater. She competed in ladies' singles. She was the 1952 Olympic champion, the 1948 Olympic bronze medalist, the 1951 World champion, and a double (1951 & 1952) European champion. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Olympic bronze medalists for India Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Great Britain Category:Olympic gold medalists for Great Britain Category:Figure skaters Category:People from Bombay Category:2021 deaths
title: Jeannette Altwegg
